description: This dataset contains all projects submitted by State of Oklahoma agencies for consideration by the Long Range Capital Planning Commission for inclusion in the FY 2015-2022 Capital Improvements Plan and FY2015 Annual Capital Budget.

name: Fiscal Year 2015 Capital Improvements Plan Project Submittals
